features: 12 Colors Highlighters: These 12pcs chisel tip highlighters are smudge-free, quick drying, and offer a no-bleed ink technology that prevents any mess on your bibles, journals, or notes.

The Perfect Fit for Bible Study Supplies: Drawdart highlighters come in a pack of 12 assorted colors that offer mild and pastel shades suitable for highlighting verses, prayers, or notes in your bible or planner.

Aesthetic Highlighters for School and Office: These cute highlighters feature a square pestle design that ensures an easy and comfortable grip while writing. Whether you're at school or work, these highlighter pens make a functional and aesthetically-pleasing choice.

Versatile Chisel Tips for Smooth Writing: With versatile chisel tips, Drawdart highlighters offer a smooth writing experience that caters to all your highlighting styles and needs. You can use them for Bible study, journaling, planning, and note taking.

Long-lasting Highlighters with 12-Month Validity: These pastel highlighters have a valid life of 12 months. To make the most of this product, it is advised to cap them after use. Get your hands on Drawdart highlighters and enjoy a seamless highlighting experience without any bleeding or fuss.
body.description: Drawdart Aesthetic Highlighters 12pcs These 12pcs highlighters with chisel tip are not only functional but also aesthetically pleasing. They are ideal for Bible study supplies, office, college, and planner supplies. Whether you want to add color to your notes, prioritize tasks, or mark important information, these highlighters are perfect for you. Overall, Drawdart highlighters caters to your demand for functional, aesthetically pleasing, and convenient highlighters. Order yours today and make your notes stand out! Various Applications Aesthetic Design Versatile Chisel Tip

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Cute Pastel Colors 12 aesthetic highlighters in different colors, with enough quantity and colors for daily use. With a smudge-free pastel design, the gentle colors won't distract you from studying or working, and won't obscure the key points you need to focus on your text. Great for bibles, journals or notes. Whether you're a student, an office worker, or simply someone who wants to make their notes colorful and organized, these highlighters are perfect for you. Drawdart Aesthetic Highlighters 12pcs These 12pcs highlighters with chisel tip are not only functional but also aesthetically pleasing. They are ideal for Bible study supplies, office, college, and planner supplies. Whether you want to add color to your notes, prioritize tasks, or mark important information, these highlighters are perfect for you. Overall, Drawdart highlighters caters to your demand for functional, aesthetically pleasing, and convenient highlighters. Order yours today and make your notes stand out! reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am very satisfied with this purchase! The variety of colors are super cute and they do not bleed. Love the size of them, very easy to hold and control unlike the more chunky markers from the major brands. I'd say though that one or two colors in here are very faint, but for the price I do not mind at all! This is such a great deal. Definitely get this for yourself or a friend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It does a great JOB!
reviews.reviewText: Honestly, for the price it does a great job in highlighting. My friends always tell me that they are cute to highlight in, they match my pencils that i also bought in amazon. they are also great for highlighting a book, although it does bleed through the pages sometimes. they are very light in color but still noticeable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everyone At Work Wants Them!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had to hide these from my coworkers, because everyone wants to use them. I was sick of the obnoxious and fluorescent BRIGHT highlighters that are more commonly used. I wanted something more calming and aesthetically pleasing. These did not disappoint. I will say that a couple of the colors are very similar to each other, and you can barely tell the difference between them. So, if you’re color coordinating things, it kind of limits your options. Still love ‘em. I’ve been using them consistently for over a month now, and none of them have run out. They’re so cheap for the quality! Def reccomend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The variety of colors
reviews.reviewText: I loved the variety of colors available. So much better than the local stores It dry quickly on my glossy calendar

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got these to highlight while bible studying, couldn't see any of the marks I made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are really nice highlighters
reviews.reviewText: Soooo pretty and they work really well and you get a lot of them 10/10 recommended

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty colours
reviews.reviewText: I love them! Exactly what I was looking for

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for work or to use in a Bible
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these for work, but quickly added one to my Bible reading routine. Love the colors and quality! Would definitely reorder.
